author: SciShow
description:
Visit https://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free and get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

Today, a lot of us walk about in leather, cotton, or other boring fabrics. But researchers are working to make the future way cooler, with flame retardant seaweed fabrics, self-healing sea silk, and polar bear inspired de-icing materials.

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: Seaweed, Pineapple, and Other Things You'll Soon Be Wearing
